# Strategic Roadmap Builder: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Strategic Roadmap Builder
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

This 18-month strategic roadmap transforms PetPulse from concept to category leader in pet health intelligence. Using the OKR (Objectives and Key Results) framework, the roadmap aligns product development, go-to-market execution, and operational scaling around clear quarterly objectives.

**Vision:** Become the #1 pet health intelligence platform, trusted by 1M+ pet parents
**18-Month Goal:** 50,000 active users, $5M ARR, category leadership

---

## Q1 2026: Foundation

### Objective 1: Launch MVP Product

**Key Results:**
| KR | Target | Measurement |
|----|--------|-------------|
| KR1 | Complete hardware design and first production run | 1,000 units manufactured |
| KR2 | Launch mobile app (iOS + Android) | Both apps live in stores |
| KR3 | Achieve 95% vital sign accuracy in testing | Clinical validation |
| KR4 | Onboard telehealth vet network | 50+ licensed vets active |

**Initiatives:**
- Finalize sensor integration and firmware
- Complete mobile app development
- Build backend infrastructure
- Recruit and train vet network
- Establish QA and testing protocols

### Objective 2: Validate Product-Market Fit

**Key Results:**
| KR | Target | Measurement |
|----|--------|-------------|
| KR1 | Recruit beta users | 200 active beta testers |
| KR2 | Achieve beta NPS | 50+ NPS score |
| KR3 | Collect testimonials | 20+ early detection stories |
| KR4 | Iterate based on feedback | 3 product iteration cycles |

**Initiatives:**
- Beta user recruitment campaign
- Weekly feedback sessions
- Rapid iteration sprints
- Testimonial collection process
- Product-market fit survey

### Objective 3: Build Foundation Team

**Key Results:**
| KR | Target | Measurement |
|----|--------|-------------|
| KR1 | Hire core engineering team | 6 engineers (HW, FW, Mobile, Backend) |
| KR2 | Hire operations lead | 1 ops hire |
| KR3 | Hire marketing lead | 1 marketing hire |
| KR4 | Establish company culture | Mission, values documented |

**Initiatives:**
- Recruiting pipeline
- Compensation benchmarking
- Culture documentation
- Onboarding process

### Objective 2: Establish Marketing Engine

**Key Results:**
| KR | Target | Measurement |
|----|--------|-------------|
| KR1 | CAC efficiency | <$100 CAC |
| KR2 | Paid channel performance | 3:1 ROAS minimum |
| KR3 | Organic traffic | 20K monthly visitors |
| KR4 | Email list growth | 10K subscribers |

**Initiatives:**

- SEO content program launch
- Email marketing automation

| KR | Target | Measurement |
|----|--------|-------------|
| KR1 | Vet clinic partnerships | 100 partner clinics |
| KR2 | Influencer partnerships | 50 active influencers |
| KR3 | Channel-attributed sales | 30% of sales from partners |
| KR4 | Partner satisfaction | 4+ out of 5 satisfaction |

**Initiatives:**
- Vet outreach program
- Partnership materials creation
- Influencer onboarding
- Referral tracking system
- Partner success program

## Milestone Summary

### Business Milestones

| Milestone | Target Date | Success Criteria |
|-----------|-------------|------------------|
| MVP Complete | Mar 2026 | All core features working |
| Public Launch | Apr 2026 | 1,000 collars sold |
| 5,000 Users | Sep 2026 | Active subscription users |
| $1M ARR | Oct 2026 | Monthly recurring revenue × 12 |
| 15,000 Users | Dec 2026 | Active subscription users |
| $2M ARR | Dec 2026 | Monthly recurring revenue × 12 |
| UK Launch | Mar 2027 | First international market |
| 50,000 Users | Jun 2027 | Active subscription users |
| $5M ARR | Jun 2027 | Monthly recurring revenue × 12 |

### Product Milestones

| Milestone | Target Date | Features |
|-----------|-------------|----------|
| MVP (V1.0) | Mar 2026 | Vitals, alerts, telehealth, dashboard |
| V1.1 | Aug 2026 | Sleep, GPS, reports |
| V1.2 | Nov 2026 | Multi-pet, respiration |
| V2.0 | Mar 2027 | Cat collar, API, insurance |

### Funding Milestones

| Round | Target Date | Amount | Purpose |
|-------|-------------|--------|---------|
| Seed | Q4 2025 | $2M | MVP development, launch |
| Series A | Q2 2027 | $10M | Scale marketing, international |

---

## Risk Management

### Key Risks & Mitigations

| Risk | Probability | Impact | Mitigation |
|------|-------------|--------|------------|
| Hardware delays | Medium | High | Multiple supplier relationships |
| Low conversion | Medium | High | Extensive A/B testing, positioning |
| Vet network shortage | Medium | Medium | Early recruiting, premium rates |
| Competition entry | Low | Medium | First-mover advantage, differentiation |
| Regulatory issues | Low | High | Conservative claims, legal review |
| High churn | Medium | High | Onboarding excellence, retention focus |

### Contingency Plans

**If launch underperforms:**
- Extend beta period
- Increase influencer investment
- Adjust pricing/offer
- Double down on vet channel

**If CAC too high:**
- Shift to organic channels
- Increase referral incentives
- Focus on PR/earned media
- Optimize conversion funnel

**If product issues:**
- Extend warranty/support
- Rapid iteration cycles
- Transparent communication
- Recall process if needed

---

## Quarterly Review Cadence

### Review Process

**Monthly:**
- KPI review (all metrics)
- OKR progress check
- Risk assessment update
- Resource reallocation decisions

**Quarterly:**
- Full OKR scoring
- Next quarter OKR setting
- Strategic adjustments
- Board/investor update
- Team retrospective

**Annually:**
- Full strategic review
- 3-year vision refresh
- Major pivots if needed
- Compensation/equity review

### OKR Scoring Guide

| Score | Meaning |
|-------|---------|
| 0.0-0.3 | Failed to make progress |
| 0.4-0.6 | Made progress but fell short |
| 0.7-0.9 | Hit target (ideal range) |
| 1.0 | Exceptional (target may have been too easy) |

**Target:** Average OKR score of 0.7-0.8 indicates appropriate ambition.

---

## Summary

### 18-Month Vision

**From:** Concept/MVP stage
**To:** Category leader with 50,000 users and $5M ARR

### Quarterly Themes

| Quarter | Theme | Key Focus |
|---------|-------|-----------|
| Q1 2026 | Foundation | MVP, beta, team |
| Q2 2026 | Launch | Go-to-market, marketing |
| Q3 2026 | Scale | Growth, V1.1, B2B |
| Q4 2026 | Expand | Leadership, international |
| H1 2027 | Dominate | 50K users, platform |

### Critical Success Factors

1. **Product excellence** - 90%+ accuracy, delightful UX
2. **Launch momentum** - Strong Week 1, press coverage
3. **CAC efficiency** - <$100 sustainable CAC
4. **Retention focus** - <5% monthly churn
5. **Team building** - A-players in key roles
6. **Category ownership** - Define "pet health intelligence"
